name: St. George Preca

locations.description: Maltese priest, founder of the Society of Christian Doctrine

summary: George Preca was a Maltese priest who founded the Society of Christian Doctrine (MUSEUM), a lay organization dedicated to catechesis and religious education. He was the first Maltese saint to be canonized and is known for his devotion to teaching the faith to children and adults. He emphasized the importance of Scripture and prayer in daily life.
